basics.name: Purna Boyapati
basics.label: Principal Software Engineer
basics.summary: Principal Software Engineer with 18+ years of experience in full-stack development, cloud architecture, and technical leadership. Expert in Java, Spring Boot, AWS, React, and microservices. Proven track record of delivering scalable solutions and leading development teams in enterprise environments.

work.name: Appfire
work.summary: Architecting and engineering Appfire Connect Framework for Atlassian Cloud Apps with serverless AWS infrastructure.
highlights: Engineered Appfire Connect Framework enabling seamless Atlassian Cloud App integration with 99.9% uptime
Architected serverless APIs using AWS Lambda (NodeJS/Java) achieving sub-100ms response times and 99.9% availability
Implemented Infrastructure as Code with AWS CDK TypeScript, reducing deployment time by 70% and eliminating manual errors
Designed AWS infrastructure stack: CloudFront, API Gateway, Lambda, DynamoDB, and AppSync GraphQL for scalable microservices
Established CI/CD pipelines with Bitbucket and AWS, enabling zero-downtime deployments and 95% test coverage
Enhanced security posture implementing OWASP guidelines, preventing XSS, SSRF, and injection attacks across all applications
Led technical architecture for Appfire's JIRA and Confluence Server Apps serving 10M+ users globally
Mentored 8 junior developers and conducted code reviews, improving team velocity by 40% and code quality by 60%

work.name: OpenText
work.summary: Engineered enterprise-grade administration tools for analytics products with workflow automation and performance optimization.
highlights: Built comprehensive administration tools for Recommind Axcelerate, Decisiv, and Perceptiv analytics products serving 500+ enterprise clients
Migrated CI/CD pipeline from GitLab to Jenkins, reducing build time by 50% and improving deployment reliability by 80%
Developed cross-platform management features using Spring Boot, Backbone.js, and custom UI frameworks for 24/7 operations
Implemented Camunda workflow engine processing 10K+ tasks daily with consistent tracking and process automation
Integrated LDAP and Active Directory authentication for 50K+ enterprise users across multiple domains
Optimized application performance achieving 60% improvement in page load times and 40% reduction in server resource usage

work.name: Pramati Technologies Private Limited
work.summary: Architected enterprise applications using modern Java technologies and frontend frameworks with focus on scalability.
highlights: Architected enterprise applications using Spring Boot, Hibernate, and Ember.js handling 1M+ daily transactions
Built RESTful web services and single-page applications with responsive design supporting 10K+ concurrent users
Implemented MVC architecture using Spring and Hibernate, reducing database queries by 45% and improving response times by 35%
Managed database operations with DB2 and Cassandra using ORM frameworks, achieving 99.5% data consistency
Developed responsive interfaces using Ember.js and Angular, improving user engagement by 50% across platforms
Leveraged Java 8 features for performance optimization, reducing memory usage by 30% and CPU utilization by 25%
Established continuous integration with Jenkins achieving 90% automated test coverage and 95% deployment success rate

work.name: Pramati Technologies Private Limited
work.summary: Developed scalable applications using Grails framework and modern web technologies with focus on performance.
highlights: Built scalable applications using Grails framework and GORM, handling 500K+ database operations daily
Developed RESTful services and integrated single-page applications achieving 200ms average response times
Implemented responsive web interfaces using modern JavaScript frameworks, improving mobile user experience by 60%
Optimized database queries and caching strategies, reducing page load times by 40% and server load by 35%
Collaborated with cross-functional teams delivering 15+ high-quality software solutions on schedule
Implemented automated testing achieving 85% code coverage and reducing bug reports by 50%

work.name: Nokia
work.summary: Worked on Nokia's Forcast Network Investments initiative as part of Self organizing network
highlights: Worked on the different aspects of Self organizing network
worked on domains like configuration, fault management, performance management, security, etc.

work.name: Nokia
work.summary: Developed telecommunications technologies and protocols for mobile network infrastructure.
highlights: Developed telecommunications protocols for 3G/UMTS networks, improving network efficiency by 35%
Engineered network solutions processing 1M+ concurrent connections with 99.8% reliability
Participated in Nokia's research initiatives contributing to 2 technical papers and 1 patent application
Optimized network algorithms reducing power consumption by 20% and improving signal coverage by 30%
Contributed to technical documentation and patent applications for network security and optimization

work.name: Sasken Communication Technologies Ltd
work.summary: Developed embedded software solutions for communication devices and real-time systems.
highlights: Developed embedded software for communication devices supporting 100K+ concurrent connections
Engineered real-time systems and communication protocols achieving sub-10ms response times
Optimized embedded code reducing memory usage by 40% and improving processing speed by 35%
Collaborated with hardware teams for system integration, delivering 5+ successful product launches
Implemented error handling and recovery mechanisms achieving 99.5% system reliability in production
